Uses of Class
danaus.Direction

  • Packages that use Direction 
    Package Description
    danaus
    The danaus package contains all the internals and implementation of the Danaus framework.

    • Uses of Direction in danaus

      Fields in danaus declared as Direction 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Direction Wind.direction
      The cardinal direction of the wind.

      static Direction Direction.opposite(Direction direction)
